isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - STEERING COLUMN ASSEMBLY, TILT - 9600, 9700, 9800 - ALIGNMENT - STEERING COLUMN TO GEAR

svcprocinfo.para:
Attach the steering column to the steering gear input shaft. Align the U-joint pinch bolt and the whistle notch in the steering gear input shaft. Use a new shear-type pinch bolt in the yoke. Refer to the proper tightening procedure in the TORQUE CHART
.

svcsubproc.title: Final Adjustment
svcsubproc.para: The steering wheel lead spoke should be parallel to the cab centerline. The steering wheel position must be checked with the cab down. If steering wheel centering is required, adjust the drag link.
